name: Princess Monster Makeover
description:
Our monster girl is not having the best days of her life so she needs a little bit help of yours while she is dressing up. In this dress up game you have lots of dress options, of course all of them in monster style.
In this monster game, you can enjoy a brand-new experience of making up and dressing up, for all our characters are not normal girls, they are monsters! Here you may see a lot of new hairstyles, dresses and decorations, they will be more distinctive than any other dress up games! Moreover, you may get some inspirations of how to dress up in the upcoming Halloween through this app.
Help her choose a hair style, eye color and put the makeup on. Then, assist her to select an attractive dress (or top and skirt, etc.), shoes, and the matched accessories (including necklace, earrings, bracelet).
So, if you really feel interested and excited about such a dress up game, please do not hesitate any more, join us, and start your amazing journey in Monster Salon!!!
Features:
• Spa Section
• Makeup Section
• Dress up Section
• Many fashionable hair styles and hair colors to choose
• Different shapes of eyebrow to choose
• Try on dozens of different eye colors, eye-shadows, mascaras, lipsticks, and more
• A lot of pretty dresses, tops, pants, skirts and coats to choose
• A huge variety of decoration items, including earrings, necklaces, bracelets to choose
• Plentiful shoes of different styles to choose
• Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions
